pages.text: The Radioactive Waste Barrel is what you would use to store radiaoactive materials. Each barrel can store 64,000mB of radioactive material. They can also be configurated to auto-eject out of the bottom by $(k:sneak) + right clicking it with a $(l:item/tools/configurator)Configurator$(/l).

The following list are radioactive substances that are stored in Radioactive Waste Barrels:$(li)$(l:chemicals/nuclear_waste)Nuclear Waste$(/l)$(li)$(l:chemicals/spent_nuclear_waste)Spent Nuclear Waste$(/l)$(li)$(l:chemicals/polonium)Polonium$(/l)$(li)$(l:chemicals/plutonium)Plutonium$(/l)$(p)Contents inside the Radioactive Waste Barrel will also slowly decay over time at a rate of 1mB/min (default configs).
